txt.en: 'You are right. I must be strong for what is to come!'
'I will not let Ambarûl fall to this evil!'
Return to Shubârza in Amalíbi's camp and let her know you managed to inspire some of the soldiers.
'What you say is true. I can not lose the will to fight.'
'Your words give me strength, my friend. I thank you'
Shubârza has noticed that the morale of some of soldiers in the camp has been low. She asks that you help inspire them for the coming fight.
Shubârza has noticed that the morale of some of soldiers in the camp has been low. She asks that you help inspire them for the coming fight.
Return to Shubârza in Amalíbi's camp

'Greetings. You may have spotted some of the saddened soldiers nearby. Can you help me to inspire them?\n\n'We are sure to have many battles ahead, but some here are already feeling weighed down by the thought. I ask that you help to cheer them up and give them any encouragement you can. Hope is a powerful weapon in battle.'
'Smiles have returned to the faces of my fellow soldiers!\n\n'Thank you, [placeholder]. Your words will give us strength in the days to come. Take this for your troubles.'
